casebody.data:
Malcolm adsm. Bayard.

This is so far Coleman's cases 131. Hoyt & Bennet v. Campbell.

Practice as to argumaus.06 °f

THE court decided, that either party might give notice to the other, of bringing on the argument of a cause, xvithout waiting for a default on the other side ,† and if the cases are not ready to be delivered to the judges, by the .. .. 5 1 cause is moved by the opposite party, he shall have, judgment by default. •
